entry.title: Sunday night: Snow or rain. Temperature rising to plus 3 by morning.
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy this evening. Snow beginning this evening then changing to rain before morning. Snowfall amount 2 to 4 cm. Rainfall amount 2 mm. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h late this evening then south 30 gusting to 50. Temperature rising to plus 3 by morning. Wind chill minus 9 this evening. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Sunday 29 January 2023

entry.title: Monday: Rain. Temperature falling to minus 3 in the afternoon.
